Name: Saurabh Chandra Patel
AboutMe:
'Who in the world am I?' Ah, that's the great puzzle!

100 + rab ===100 GOD, ;-)

I was born and brought up in Chandauli Uttar Pradesh, next to Varanasi. After completion of my Primary education from my village ,I shifted to Chandauli and after that I shifted to Agra where I obtained my 4 year Bachelor Degree in Computer Science & Engineering with Honors from Uttar Pradesh Technical Education Lucknow.

In the year of 2011 I graduated in Computer Science & Engineering from U.P Technical University Lucknow.

During my graduation, I got my first Job in Corpus Software in Noida where I worked around 1 years. I have worked for REC (Ministry of Power ) and UID (UNIQUE IDENTIFICATION) .

Currently I am working with Nimbuzz Internet India Pvt Ltd based in Gurgaon from last 2yr years and enjoying my role with Web Development.

My personal styles are - extrovert, strategic thinker, helping in nature and I am open for feedback and share /learn to grow myself better as an individual or with a team. I'm .....JUST A COMMON Software ENGINEER....I m just a Common software engineer... "A Wednesday" style ,Passionate about Open Source Development from last 4yr (Experience 4yr).
